Package org.apache.freemarker.core.util

Various classes used by core FreeMarker code but might be useful outside of it too.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommonBuilder<ProductT>
    Common interface for builders (used for implementing the builder design pattern).
    CommonSupplier<ProductT>
    Similar to java.util.function.Supplier in Java 8, but we don't require Java 8.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CallableUtils
    Utilities for implementing and calling TemplateCallableModel-s (such as TemplateDirectiveModel-s and TemplateFunctionModel-s).
    DeepUnwrap
    Utility methods for unwrapping TemplateModel-s.
    OptInTemplateClassResolver
    A TemplateClassResolver that resolves only the classes whose name was specified in the constructor.
    StringToIndexMap
    Maps string keys to non-negative int-s.
    StringToIndexMap.Entry  
    TemplateLanguageUtils
    Static utility methods that perform tasks specific to the FreeMarker Template Language (FTL).
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BugException
    An unexpected state was reached that is certainly caused by a bug in FreeMarker.
    DuplicateStringKeyException
    A string key is duplicated in something where keys must be unique.
    GenericParseException
    Exception thrown when a we want to parse some text but its format doesn't match the expectations.
    UndeclaredThrowableException
    The equivalent of JDK 1.3 UndeclaredThrowableException.
    UnrecognizedTimeZoneException
    Indicates that the time zone name is not recognized.
    UnsupportedNumberClassException
    Thrown when FreeMarker runs into a Number subclass that it doesn't yet support.

Package org.apache.freemarker.core.util Description

Various classes used by core FreeMarker code but might be useful outside of it too.
